casebody.data:
Shreve
v.
N.C. Dept. of Justice, et al. 151P14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Ms. Kimberly Shreve, Pro Se.

Mr. Christopher McLennan, Assistant Attorney General, For N.C. Department of Justice, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of May 2016 by Plaintiff for Leave to File Amended Complaint:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
